subject: CORRECTED: Validation Result p3-3 Windows CI fixes

issues: Integration test fails because workflow calls 'launcher.bat --test' but launcher.bat doesn't support --test flag
Self-validation claim of 'successful execution' was false - run 22244704043 failed
launcher.bat only supports: ralph, update, notify, monitor, --help
findings.required_fix: Either: (1) Add --test flag to launcher.bat, OR (2) Change workflow to use --help instead of --test
findings.notes: Good work on YAML parsing and --help flag fixes. One simple fix needed to achieve 100% CI success.

content.summary: p3-3 PARTIAL PASS. Core work solid but needs small fix: launcher.bat missing --test flag that workflow expects.
